summary: This document is a JPMorgan Private Bank account statement for Ghislaine Maxwell for the period June 1-29, 2007. It shows significant financial activity, including a $7.4 million wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's account at Mellon Bank. The document was filed as a government exhibit in a legal proceeding.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary account holder for the JPMorgan Private Bank statement, showing deposits, withdrawals, and a large incoming wire transfer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the originator (B/O) of a $7.4 million wire transfer from his account at Mellon Bank in St. Thomas to Ghislaine Maxwell's account.

persons.name: Francisco Villacis
persons.context: Listed as part of the JPMorgan Private Bank team on the account summary page.

connections.description: Epstein sent a $7.4 million wire transfer from his bank account to Maxwell's JPMorgan account in June 2007.

events.title: $7.4 Million Wire Transfer from Epstein
events.description: A wire credit for $7,400,000.00 is deposited into Ghislaine Maxwell's account, originating from Jeffrey Epstein's account at Mellon Bank in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.title: High-Volume Account Activity
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's JPMorgan account shows over $7.6 million in credits and a similar amount in debits during the month, indicating substantial financial movement.

locations: St. Thomas, VI 00802-1348 (Location of Jeffrey Epstein's Mellon Bank account)
New York, NY 10022 (Location associated with Ghislaine Maxwell's account)
keyFacts: A $7.4 million wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell occurred on June 15, 2007.
The document is a government exhibit (502 S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), indicating it was used as evidence in a legal proceeding.
Ghislaine Maxwell's JPMorgan account had over $7.6 million in total credits and debits during this one-month period.
The document is marked 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan Chase'.
Payroll deposits from 'NES LLC' are listed, suggesting a business or employment relationship.
